analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xc80638962890acf89f9cf5755ac197239e108ae2.sol:
	Contract DoyenToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xc80638962890acf89f9cf5755ac197239e108ae2.sol#93)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xc80638962890acf89f9cf5755ac197239e108ae2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_contracts/0xc80638962890acf89f9cf5755ac197239e108ae2.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_spender' of DoyenToken.increaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0xc80638962890acf89f9cf5755ac197239e108ae2.sol#188-189) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of DoyenToken.increaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0xc80638962890acf89f9cf5755ac197239e108ae2.sol#189) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of DoyenToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0xc80638962890acf89f9cf5755ac197239e108ae2.sol#207-208) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of DoyenToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0xc80638962890acf89f9cf5755ac197239e108ae2.sol#208) is not in mixedCase
